page.shortlink: grid component client side canrowcanceledits event
page.description: Fires when the user tries to cancel edits made to an individual row in the Grid. If the event returns false, the action is cancelled.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: rowNumber
property.description: The row number of the Grid row that fired the event. New record rows have negative row numbers.
